name: Roots of Yggdrasil (HairyTea, Evan Williams, Darragh Lynch, Funnymike)
name_original: Roots of Yggdrasil (HairyTea, Evan Williams, Darragh Lynch, Funnymike)
description:
Yggdrasil is at risk of being chopped down. Plant trees which are imbued with the power of Norse Gods to fight off the onslaught of lumberjacks and protect Yggdrasil from being destroyed.

  •  Plant trees using the "Tree Menu" button. Pick your tree if you can afford it then place it near the path
  • You start with different amounts of life essence every round to hold back the enemy so place your trees wisely
  • When Trees are placed and you are ready, hit that "Next wave button" to start the wave. Good Luck!

This game was made as a team for Global Game Jam 2023.

Use "Left Click" to interact with buttons and placing trees. Hold the "Right Click" to look around with the camera. To zoom in and out hold "Right Click" and scroll with the "Mouse Wheel"

MemberRoleDarragh LynchArtist / VFX DesignerMikhail FisenkoArtist / Level DesignerEvan WilliamsProgrammer / Sound DesignerAaron HeraghtyProgrammer
